post_stage1.text: HAHA! I'm free, im free! Free from that wretched box of a cell! But this place still reeks of confinement.
Though... I'm not exactly free, I'm still in this hellish pit hole of a prison. The walls seem to mock me with their permanence.
I could easily escape however, but... I'm craving chaos. I'll stir up some trouble before I make my grand exit.
(Mizuchi steps out of her cell, the cell that had kept her in for what must have been forever.)
Ahh, fresh air! It's invigorating after that suffocating cell.
Not finished, however. People can still recognize me, and I'll be back in that box again. I need a disguise, a new face.
Mizuchi: I could possess someone, but who though? Someone unsuspecting and easily manipulated.
There's my little puppet~ My ticket out of hell.
Hey! How the hell did you get out here--
Where's the tall horned one? I always see you two paired up...did it not work out?~
That is none of your concern! Get back in your cell or--
Listen, I can provide more than that tall blonde. I'll help you achieve the impossible and always support your decisions--
You must think I'm stupid, because not also me, but everyone in Gensoyko knows what you do to people Mizuchi.
--Don't you dare mention my relationship with Yuugi! You should be more concerned on how you'll even cross this bridge with me in the middle of it.
It's always the jealous ones, but don't worry, I can change your mind once I show you!

post_stage2.text: What did you say earlier? That everyone in Gensoyko knows what I do?
My, that's not really fair. You judge before you can even get to know me, I'm not that bad Parsee~
Stay away from me! I won't let you--
It's okay, I'll help you give pointers whenever you speak to Yuugi, so guys can finally go on a date finally.
Well...more like I go on the date with her~
(Mizuchi possesses Parsee and gains her abilities.)
Okay that took longer than expected.
The Sanzu River, and a boat too! Okay let's get out of here!

post_stage3.text:
The walls are now cleared. 
...who's that in the distance?
You're not supposed to break out of this prison, Mizuchi.
Not like this prison can hold me in anyway.
Oh really? I'd like to see you try.
